name: jtox-kit
description: A JavaScript client library of chem-informatics related widgets, components, etc.

scripts.pretest: rm -f www/jtox-kit* && export VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && sed -E -e "s/\{\{VERSION\}\}/$VERSION/" core/Core.js > core/start.js && smash core/start.js > www/jtox-kit.js && rm -rf core/start.js && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.js tests/libs && rsync node_modules/jasmine-core/lib/jasmine-core/*.css tests/libs && rsync node_modules/underscore/*.js tests/libs && rsync node_modules/as-sys/*.js libs && rsync node_modules/solr-jsx/*.js libs
scripts.test: jasmine-node tests && uglifyjs -nc -mt < www/jtox-kit.js > www/jtox-kit.min.js && npm run-script widgets
scripts.widgets: smash widgets/*.js > www/jtox-kit.widgets.js && uglifyjs -nc -mt < www/jtox-kit.widgets.js > www/jtox-kit.widgets.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && pushd www && chmod a-w jtox-kit.*.js && zip jtox-kit.zip ../LICENSE ../README.md jtox-kit.*.js && popd
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
